item.title: GZip Compression Check in curl
item.description: icasimpan@icasimpan.local:~$ curl -H "Accept-Encoding: gzip" -I -udemo:demo http://example.com HTTP/1.1 200 OK Date: Wed, 04 Oct 2017 15:25:48 GMT Server: Apache/2.4.18 (Ubuntu) X-Drupal-Cache: HIT Etag: "1507130489-1" Content-Language: en X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN Link: </node/171>; rel="shortlink",</home>; rel="canonical" X-Generator: Drupal 7 (http://drupal.org) Cache-Control: public, max-age=60 Last-Modified: Wed, 04 Oct 2017 15:21:29 GMT Expires: Sun, 19 Nov 1978 05:00:00 GMT Vary: Cookie,Accept-Encoding Content-Encoding: gzip Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Look at “Content-Encoding”. It says ‘gzip’.
